turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to order two medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni and bacon on both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure those are thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But otherwise, no. That'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed and will b ready in 35 minutes. i've also sent you the receipt via text.
